page.title: 20THE FUTURE ?
page.content: At present, the area of{Ham and {Petersham}contains a unique mixture of historic buildings, varied types of housing and large areas of natural open space, such as Richmond Park and Ham Common. In the future, there may be greater pressure for new developments but we would hope that any such developments would maintain the character of the area that make it one of the most pleasant environments in Greater London. {ACKNOWLEGDEMENTS}- The following schools have been involved in the survey. {Grey Court Comprehensive School, Ham. {Meadlands JMI School, Ham. {St.Richard's with St.Andrew's Junior {School,Ham. {The Russell Junior School, Petersham. {St.Mary's Junior School, Twickenham. } {Photographs taken by Zoe Mellor.
